name: KIRO II: The Wizards Guild
description:
Enter the world of KIRO II: The Wizards Guild, an immersive multiplayer dungeon crawler that combines fantasy and adventure! Gather up to six players online and embark on an epic journey through semi-procedurally generated dungeons. Using a classic text command system, you'll battle ferocious monsters, collect rare loot, and take on mighty dungeon bosses to prove your might. Are you ready to join the Guild and become a true wizard?

Randomly Generated Dungeons...


Navigate through semi-randomly generated dungeons that each contain a special dungeon boss.

Online Multiplayer Up to 6 Players...


Join with up to 6 players to adventure through multiple dungeons, each with their own dungeon boss. Work together to find loot chests and defeat enemies in semi-randomly generated worlds.

Save Items Between Dungeon Runs...


With a rich leveling system similar to classic tabletop games and MMORPG's of the past, players can specialize their playstyle to how they want. With the use of Steam's inventory system, loot collected by players can be traded from player to player and persist from game to game.

Real-time Text Commands...
